name: Coloring Book: Space in Pixels
description:
Color Space Pixel Art by number with your fingers. Tons of art, new puzzles added daily, everything is free! No subscription needed.

You will get calming and relaxing experience with our coloring book. Try it now, and you won't regret it.

Why us?
- Tons of pictures;
- New art every day;
- Customizable settings;
- Import photos;
- Share with friends;
- Free of charge!

How it all works?
1. Choose pixel art image you like;
2. Follow palette in the bottom of the screen to finish the puzzle;
3. Share with friends and have fun!

You do not need any drawing skills to play our game; everyone can do it!
